Package cams.filter

Class CampFilterController

java.lang.Object
cams.filter.CampFilterController
public class CampFilterController extends Object
The CampFilterController class manages filtering strategies for camps. It is designed as a singleton to ensure a single point of control for filter strategies across the application.
Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen
